summary.span: 提供导航和用户界面 (UI)，以跨多个步骤收集相关数据。

span.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [向导组件Wizard Components](#components) - [向导步骤Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [数据收集向导Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [向导的命令名称Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [动态更改步骤Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [向导外观Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 你可以使用控制转移到：You can use the control to: - 跨多个步骤收集相关的数据。Collect related data across multiple steps. - 分解较大的网页用于收集用户输入到较小的逻辑步骤。Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps. - 可以完成的步骤的线性或非线性导航。Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps. ## 向导组件Wizard Components 控件由以下组件构成：The control is made up of the following components: - A页面开发人员定义包含每个步骤的用户界面的步骤的集合。A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer. - 内置的导航功能，用于确定相应的按钮以显示基于值。Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the value. - 标头区域，它可以对其进行自定义，以向用户目前的步骤中显示特定信息。A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on. - 控件中的步骤可用于快速导航到一个侧栏区域。A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，保留在源视图。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果你更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行此页面的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为可能指向了另一个步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. ## 向导步骤Wizard Steps 每个中的步骤控件具有属性，用于确定具有的导航功能的类型。Each of the steps in the control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has. 如果未指定的值属性，默认值是。If you do not specify a value for the property, the default value is . 下表列出的可用设置属性和步骤所产生行为。The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step. `WizardStepType.Auto` 由在其中声明该步骤的顺序确定的导航步骤呈现的用户界面。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 该步骤是要显示的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one to appear. 不呈现任何导航按钮。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 步是收集用户数据的最后一个。The step is the last one that collects user data. **完成**呈现用于导航的按钮。The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 该步骤是要显示的第一个步骤。The step is the first one to appear. A**上一步**不呈现按钮。A **Previous** button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 该步骤是任何步骤之间第一个和最后一个。The step is any step between the first and last. 呈现用于导航的“上一步”和“下一步”按钮。**Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation. ## 数据收集向导Collecting Wizard Data 使用控件，可以通过线性或非线性导航收集的数据。Using the control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation. 正在跳过不必要的步骤或返回到以前完成的步骤，若要更改某个值非线性导航的一些示例。Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value. 控件保持其状态的步骤，因此不需要的所有步骤之前要持久化到数据存储在一个步骤中输入的数据之间控件已完成。The control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the control have been completed. 或者，如果你想要收集将数据保存到数据存储为每个步骤完成，例如，当引发事件，应将属性对象传递给`false`，以便用户无法返回到以前完成的步骤和后已提交更改的数据。Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the event is raised, you should set the property of the object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted. ## 向导的命令名称Wizard Command Names 控件继承从下面的命令名类和类： ， ， ，和。The control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and . 向导控件将忽略这些命令名称，并且不包含任何特殊逻辑，用于启用这些命令，使其自动适用于导航。The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation. 如果命令名称被删除或中的按钮中缺少控件，不会引发异常。If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the control, no exception is thrown. 例如，如果按钮缺少的值，不会引发异常。For example, if the button is missing a value for , no exception is thrown. ## 动态更改步骤Dynamically Changing Steps 你可以使用方法或属性可以动态更改当前显示在步骤控件。You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果以编程方式添加中`Page_Load`事件处理程序，必须将在导航窗格添加到之前页面加载该步骤。If you programmatically add a in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading. ## 向导外观Wizard Appearance 外观控件是通过模板、 外观和样式设置完全可自定义。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings. 例如，你可以使用， ， ， ，和可自定义的接口属性控件。For example, you can use the , , , , and properties to customize the interface of the control. > [!NOTE] > 设置， ， ， ， ，或属性重新创建的子控件控件。Setting the , , , , , or property recreates the child controls of the control. 因此，在过程中丢失的子控件的视图状态。As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process. 若要避免这种情况下，显式维持的控件状态的控件的子控件，或避免使模板内部的控件。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 请注意，控件不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现为非标准或 quirks 模式。Note that the control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 若要获取最佳的 Internet Explorer 呈现使用控制，请使用 XHTML 文档类型，默认情况下，在 Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中添加。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 格式设置使用的布局模板Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制可用于指定的控件布局，而无需使用 HTML`table`元素。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反，你可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素以指定的布局。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在模板中，你创建占位符控件以指示应在控件中动态插入项的位置。In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (这是类似于如何模板模型控件的工作原理。)有关更多信息，请参见 属性。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义控件来收集用户的名称和地址，并可以输入一个单独的邮寄地址。The following code example demonstrates how to define a control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address. 如果用户未选择**SeparateShippingCheckBox**，从而发出请求以添加单独的发货地址，控件移动，直接从`Step2`到`Finish`。If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`. 上`Finish`步骤中，用户也可以选择返回到的开头通过单击控件**GoBackButton**; 但是，它将用户带到`Step2`因为属性`Step1`设置为`false`。On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the property for `Step1` is set to `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/CS/wizardclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard/VB/wizardclassvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是上述示例中使用的 Web 页的代码隐藏文件。The following code example is the code-behind file for the Web page used in the preceding example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回中当前显示的对象控件。The property returns the object that is currently displayed in the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，你可以使用属性来访问当前的属性对象。The property is read-only; however, you can use the property to access the properties of the current object. 使用属性可以动态更改为另一种对象。Use the property to dynamically change the to a different object. 或者，可以使用方法动态设置属性。Alternatively, you can use the method to dynamically set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪个步骤设置下一步属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which step to set as the next property of the control. 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、属性设置为`Wizard1.Step3`; 否则为属性设置为`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/CS/wizardactivestepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/VB/wizardactivestepvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的从零开始的索引中当前显示的对象控件。The property provides the zero-based index of the object that is currently displayed in the control. 你可以以编程方式设置属性控制哪个步骤向用户显示在运行时。You can programmatically set the property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，保留在源视图。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果你更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行此页面的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为可能指向了另一个步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果你设置的值为-1 以支持向导，默认情况下不需要执行步骤，出现以下行为：If you set the value of to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - 如果你以声明方式设置到-1 或设置它为-1 作为默认值，该控件将始终尝试将呈现向导的第一步。If you declaratively set to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard. - 如果以编程方式设置为-1，控件将不会呈现。If you programmatically set to -1, the control will not render. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来设置属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the property of the control. 如果值`CheckBox1.Checked`是`true`、属性设置为`Wizard1.Step3`; 否则为属性设置为`Wizard1.Step2`。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/CS/wizardactivestepindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/VB/wizardactivestepindexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以从派生类由于的仅访问其`protected`修饰符。The method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier. 在派生类中，你可以使用方法来确定是否可以用中传递的索引来设置属性。In a derived class, you can use the method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the property. 方法将返回`false`中传递的索引是指如果对象已被访问并具有其属性设置为`false`; 否则为它将返回`true`。The method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a object that has already been accessed and has its property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的派生的类`CustomWizard`，并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the method. 在侧栏区域中的按钮时`CustomWizard`单击控件，调用方法来确定是否可以访问所选的步骤。When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed. 一条消息然后写入包含的 Web 页面，以通知所出现的情况的用户。A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时**取消**按钮上控件被单击。The event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件，以便提供附加处理时**取消**单击按钮。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 当**取消**单击按钮时，页面重定向到http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick/CS/wizardcancelbuttonclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardCancelButtonClick/VB/wizardcancelbuttonclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元格宽度;因此，距离将应用于列中最宽的单元格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格共享相同的单元格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 因此，距离将应用于行中最高的单元格。Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性进行编程的布局以声明方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to program the layout of the control declaratively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时**完成**按钮上控件被单击。The event is raised when the **Finish** button on the control is clicked. 使用事件，以便提供附加处理时**完成**单击按钮。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Finish** button is clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 当**完成**单击按钮时，一条确认消息写入到`Label1`和`Label1.Visible`属性设置为`true`，以便该消息显示在该步骤。When the **Finish** button is clicked, a confirmation message is written to `Label1` and the `Label1.Visible` property is set to `true` so that the message is displayed on the step. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的自定义内容上显示的导航区的步骤控件。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板定义的内容步骤。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 模板的自定义内容包含在对象。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 你可以添加到自定义内容对象在设计视图中或通过定义通过使用模板编辑模式对象内联使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`标记。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中包含的对象属性必须包含两个控件，另一个使用其属性设置为"MoveComplete"，另一种具有其属性设置为"MovePrevious"，以启用导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature. 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用集合对象。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 你还可以使用方法对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性创建自定义模板的导航区步骤，用于控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the step for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI)控件。You can use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the control. 若要指定的布局模板，将添加`LayoutTemplate`内的元素控件标记。To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control markup. 内部`LayoutTemplate`元素中，添加的组件的占位符控件。Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the control. 导航、 栏中，和的向导步骤部分的占位符控件中需要`LayoutTemplate`元素。Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element. > [!NOTE] > 你可以修改在布局模板**源**视图。You can modify the layout template in **Source** view. 编辑中的布局模板**设计**不支持视图。Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加`LayoutTemplate`元素`Wizard`控件以及如何设置格式的组件`Wizard`控件通过使用`div`元素。The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements. 当控件呈现，则`div`元素将使用而不是 HTML 表，若要设置控件的格式。When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.

summary.span: 获取一个对 对象的引用，该对象定义控件上导航区域中按钮的设置。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性上定义的导航区域中的按钮的外观控件。The property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置与单个按钮样式合并属性。The style settings for the property are merged with the individual button styles. 在应用中的各个按钮样式属性任何设置将重写中的相应设置属性。Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the property. 例如，如果你设置`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性`"green"`，该按钮的颜色将为红色，因为各个样式设置属性重写的设置属性。For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the property override the settings of the property. 以下属性样式重写了各个按钮样式设置：The following property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发事件时属性更改控制。The method raises the event when the property of the control is changed. 使用以提供额外的处理时的当前步骤的事件将显示在控制更改。Use the event to provide additional processing when the current step that is displayed in the control changes. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the property of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的侧栏上的按钮的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在应用任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 以下样式属性重写了设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观控制边栏，属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control sidebar, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的外观**下一步**按钮上的步骤控件。The property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 样式设置属性合并的样式设置属性。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 在应用的任何设置，它属性重写中的相应设置属性。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于显示的文本**下一步**按钮上的步骤控件。The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 根据值属性，属性可以显示为上一个按钮的文本显示在浏览器中不呈现图像，图像的替代项为或链接的文本的文本。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出的字段值属性以及每一项的相应效果**下一步**按钮文本。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text. 在按钮上显示文本。Text appears on the button. 文本显示为图像的替换文本。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文本显示为链接。Text appears as a link. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的自定义内容上显示的导航区的步骤控件。Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板定义的内容步骤。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 模板的自定义内容包含在对象。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 你可以添加到自定义内容对象在设计视图中或通过定义通过使用模板编辑模式对象内联使用`StepNavigationTemplate`标记。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 中包含的对象属性必须包含两个控件，另一个使用其属性设置为`"MoveNext"`另一个使用其属性设置为`"MovePrevious"`，若要启用导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature. 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用集合对象。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 你还可以使用方法对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有指定属性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的集合组成对象控件。The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 你可以使用集合来访问中包含的对象以编程方式控制。You can use the collection to access the objects that are contained in the control programmatically. 使用， ， ，和操作的方法以编程方式对象集合中。Use the , , , and methods to manipulate the objects in the collection programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，保留在源视图。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果你更改属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行此页面的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为可能指向了另一个步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果控件包含多个集合，集合将合并。If the control contains multiple collections, the collections will be merged. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建以编程方式控制以及如何使用方法将添加对象添加到集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control programmatically and how to use the method to add objects to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/CS/wizardstepscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/VB/wizardstepsvb.aspx#1)]
